= Introduction =
A list of milestones for the project



= Details =
== Milestone 1 == 
=== 2008-02-11 to 2008-03-10 ===
 * Study of similar existing applications
 * Study of gnizr framework and technology[Java, Tomcat]
 * Decide System requirements/Features
 * System architecture
 * Application Design - High level and low level design
== Milestone 2 ==
=== 2008-03-10 to 2008-03-24 ===
 * Discuss and Define layout of web widget
 * Discuss and Define interface between web widget and backend
 * Discuss and Decide test cases and generate test case data.
== Milestone 3 ==
=== 2008-03-24 to 2008-04-14 ===
 * Implementation of server modules
    # Audumbar - interface between web widget and backend,
    # Audumbar - server component for web content analysis,
    # Uday - user feedback manager at server,
    # Uday - bookmark retriever an interface to gnizr bookmarks database.
 * Implementation of Web widget
    # Kishor - Client UI layout with URLs and user feedback options,
    # Kishor - client component for Web content scraping
 * Unit Testing
== Milestone 4 ==
=== 2008-04-14 to 2008-04-21 ===
 * Integration of various modules
   # Audumbar - integration of server side components
   # kishor - integration of client side components
 * Integration Testing
== Milestone 5 ==
=== 2008-04-21 to 2008-05-12 ===
 * Deployment - Uday
 * Testing - Uday
== Milestone 6 ==
=== 2008-05-12 to 2008-05-16 ===
 * Demonstration
 * Documentation
